The firm helped with the comeback of Hostess' Twinkies, which were discontinued in 2012 and at one point were offered for thousands of dollars on EBay before stores could begin stocking them again months later.
Metropoulos is the son of billionaire investor C. Dean Metropoulos and an executive at the private equity firm C. Metropoulos & Co., which co-owns Hostess Brands with Apollo Global Management.
